segments.text: Two people were robbed last night near the park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Again ? The area around the park is too dark at night . There should be more lights there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid of the dark . I don â€™ t feel safe in the dark . I feel someone is hiding in the dark to attack me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your feelings might be right . You should never walk alone there at night . It is too dangerous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I Know . And you should be more careful , too .
segments.speaker: S1
